headline: Why Citi is turning more bullish on semi equipment stocks
summary: Investing.com -- Citi revealed Monday that it has turned more positive on U.S. semiconductor equipment stocks, lifting its 2025 and 2026 wafer fab equipment (WFE) forecasts and raising price targets on Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT), KLA Corp., and Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX).

raw.headline: Why Citi is turning more bullish on semi equipment stocks

headline: Citi adds Applied Materials to focus list on valuation gap with peers
summary: Investing.com -- Citi added Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) to its U.S. focus list, citing an improving sales outlook and an unwarranted valuation gap with semiconductor capital equipment peers Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) and KLA Corp.
